body_html:
The Log Uniform sampler is similar to the torch.distributions.Multinomial op, so it could fall inside torch.distributions.

The Sampled Softmax loss function is the standard for training large-scale language models. Currently, only TensorFlow and Torch support training those models.

I also added unit tests, derived from TensorFlow's implementation, to check the ops.

body:
The Log Uniform sampler is similar to the torch.distributions.Multinomial op, so it could fall inside torch.distributions.

The Sampled Softmax loss function is the standard for training large-scale language models. Currently, only TensorFlow and Torch support training those models.

I also added unit tests, derived from TensorFlow's implementation, to check the ops.
